data: Emily Chen works as a General Partner at Startopia Ventures in the Venture Capital industry.
Emily Chen has eight years of experience in venture capital.
Emily Chen founded Startopia Ventures in 2016 with a focus on early-stage enterprise SaaS.
Emily Chen has led investments in multiple unicorn companies.
Emily Chen serves on several boards and has expertise in fundraising, go-to-market strategy, and scaling operations.
Emily Chen is based in San Francisco, CA, United States.
